about_the_game:
It's the solo album of Dream 4 You members.
Dream 4 You(D4U) is an Japanese character and artist group whose lineup comprised Kaoru Hayano as MISAKI,Yuuka Ueno as TSUKASA,Misaki Suzuki as AZUMI,Yuubi Midorikawa as KARIN,Yui Hasegawa as RIKO.
20 songs used by the video game：Song of Memories.

■Tracklist(D4U menber's solo songs):


01,Resolve-MISAKI-
02,Singing breeze-MISAKI-
03,subliminal melody-MISAKI-
04,Beyond The Wave-TSUKASA-
05,奇跡の水面-TSUKASA-
06,睡蓮のラビリンス-TSUKASA-
07,Cheer up-AZUMI-
08,二人のシンフォニア-AZUMI-
09,君だけのサンシャイン-AZUMI-
10,君の元へ-KARIN-
11,Dream Vision-KARIN-
12,Trail Contrail-KARIN-
13,Save the Soul-RIKO
14,LIGHTNING HEART-RIKO-
15,雷鼓-RIKO-
16,getwell-MISAKI-
17,getwell-TSUKASA-
18,getwell-AZUMI-
19,getwell-KARIN-
20,getwell-RIKO-

mp3/160kbps
This DLC is saved on the game file.
